ðŸ“– Summary: Krillin AI is an all-in-one video translation and dubbing tool that simplifies the process of localizing video content. It offers features like one-click workflow initiation, precise subtitle generation using Whisper, smart segmentation with LLMs, professional-grade translation, voice cloning, and automatic video formatting for various platforms. The tool aims to transform raw footage into polished, platform-ready content with minimal effort.
